name: ArtifactoryBuildPromotion
description: Promote a published build in Artifactory.
author: JFrog

inputs.name: artifactoryService
inputs.label: Artifactory service
inputs.helpMarkDown: Artifactory service used for build promotion.

inputs.name: buildName
inputs.label: Build name
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Name of a build, which is already published to Artifactory, to be promoted.
To use the default build name of the pipeline, set the field to '$(Build.DefinitionName)'.

inputs.name: buildNumber
inputs.label: Build number
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Number of a build, which is already published to Artifactory, to be promoted.
To use the default build number of the pipeline, set the field to '$(Build.BuildNumber)'.

inputs.name: comment
inputs.label: Comment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Allows the user to add a comment describing the reason for promotion.

inputs.name: sourceRepo
inputs.label: Source repository
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sets the source repository from which to promote the release published artifacts. If not specified, Artifactory would determine from which repository to promote.

inputs.name: includeDependencies
inputs.label: Include build dependencies
inputs.helpMarkDown: When selected the build dependencies will be promoted.

inputs.name: copy
inputs.label: Use copy
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to copy the promoted artifacts and dependencies. If this field is not selected, they will be moved.

inputs.name: dryRun
inputs.label: Dry run
inputs.helpMarkDown: When selected, the promotion is simulated and the build is not promoted. A failed simulation causes the task to fail.
